title: saaragu meragaadhanE (jaavali)
sahitya:
sAragu meragAdanE 

anupallavi

 A narula keduTa nannu dUrEdi vAniki

caraNam 1

 kAntu sama rUpuDanE kAntanunE centanurO cendanutE vandanutE 
centa balavandalaku tondara viDAmulivA pandamulADuTa

caraNam 2

 prANapati nA cendarAkanE intadUra dUrEdi sundara
 nAthuniki rItigAdu mandara uddhAruDaina shrInivAsuniki
